ebsEnabled.description: Whether EBS volumes are attached to data nodes in the domain.

iops.description: Baseline input/output (I/O) performance of EBS volumes attached to data nodes.

throughput.description: The throughput (in MiB/s) of the EBS volumes attached to data nodes.

volumeSize.description: Size of EBS volumes attached to data nodes (in GB).

volumeType.description: Type of EBS volumes attached to data nodes.
